title: Validation and Application of a MOOC Web Content Quality Model

context.prior_knowledge: MOOC Development Process and Basic Learning Design Concepts Comprehension
context.additional_context: Professionals validating a quality evaluation system for MOOC content development while establishing a collaborative learning environment using personal devices

learning_goals: Evaluate the validity of MOOC web content quality elements using the learning design-based 7C Framework and PDCA model
Quantify agreement levels on quality elements among expert groups through Rasch model analysis
Propose systematic verification and improvement methods for internal quality elements (structure, content, interaction, etc.) from a content developer perspective
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
